taskGroup.name: Getting Started With gEclipse
taskGroup.intro:
This set of cheat sheets will guide you through the set up process of using gEclipse.
You can select a task to work on, either by following the hyperlink offered below, or by selecting a task after expanding the tree above.
The second set of tasks Grid Project View Set Up of this cheat sheet group depends on the first set Preliminary Set Up. If you have not completed the first set, you should do so before moving on to the second set.
Otherwise, if you are not allowed to move on even though your gEclipse is already set up, i.e. if you have restared Getting Started With gEclipse cheat sheet set, you may advance by skipping the individual tasks of the set separately or skipping the whole set at once.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations you have completed all the tasks that were required before you could start interacting with the Grid.

taskGroup.name: Preliminary Set Up
taskGroup.intro:
First you will learn how to set up gEclipse environment.
The tasks in this group may be started in any order.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations you have completed the set up of gEclipse environment.

task.name: Downloading CA Certificates
task.intro: This cheat sheet walks through the process of downloading CA certificates.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations you have succeeded in downloading CA certificates.

task.name: Creating an Authentication Token
task.intro: This cheat sheet walks you through the process of creating Authentication Token.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations you have succeeded in creating your authentication token.

taskGroup.name: Grid Project View Set Up
taskGroup.intro:
Next you will learn how to set up your gEclipse project view.
This task group is a sequence which means that if you click on the subtask "Creating a Grid Job" it will not let that task be started until "Create a java project" has been completed.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations you have succeeded in seting up your grid project view.

task.name: Creating a Grid Project
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you in the process of creating a new grid project.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations you have succeeded in creating a new grid project.

task.name: Creating a Grid Job
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you in the process of creating a grid job.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations you have succeeded in creating a grid job.
